EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tom, Since we the contract with Beacon I could technically activate your account now. However, it seems that you won’t be billing against that SOW until fall. If that is the case I will wait to activate the account until we approach that date.
